title: Will the streetlights on the Brunswick County approaches to the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge be repaired or replaced during the current brige painting contract scheduled to end in July?  (The lights on the bridge were replaced but the approach lighting was cancelled last year and the NCDOT has not mentioned whether or not those lights will be replaced.)
text:
